website_summaries.verdict: Computerized and EPA certified, this system effectively controls water costs.
pros: We love the water rebates as well as the coverage – up to 16 zones
Syncs with multiple weather data systems to customize appropriate irrigation settings
Simplified user interface allows for quick programming and analysis
cons: Takes some wiring skill during initial setup

customer_reviews.title: Worked okay until April 2019 firmware update brick'ed it
customer_reviews.text: User interface was usually a little slow to respond, but functioned adequately for two summers. Before 2019 season, a firmware update that was pushed to the device apparently caused it to become inoperable hanging on the "Loading RainMachine data..." screen despite failed attempts to restore it to factory settings. Customer Support told us that we would have to pay to ship it back for evaluation and likely pay even more to have it repaired depending on the discovered issue. I would not recommend this product given the lack of customer support when the issue was almost certainly related to a pushed update caused by the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The device is great, the smartphone app is not.
customer_reviews.text: I like theRainMachine. The device itself is great. The app, the iOS version anyway used to be great as well, but with each new version they introduce more bugs than they fix. If you're planning on using the web browser interface to interact with the device, you'll be fine. If you want to use a smartphone app to control your device, look elsewhere. These folks make a great device, but the quality of their companion smartphone app has gone from great to garbage over the past couple of years.
customer_reviews.author: Hal Mounce

customer_reviews.title: REMOTE ACCESS ISSUES
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the remote access for this product. The app crashes as soon as you open it on your iPhone. I also tried it on my iPad and my wife's iPhone. This same complaint is clearly expressed by many others who have provided customer reviews of the app in the Apple's App Store. I contacted their "support team" and they suggested by email that I delete and reinstall the app. I followed their advice and it continues to crash upon opening. Unless I find a fix for this, I plan on sending it back and buying a replacement..I cannot imagine why Amazon would sell this until this issue is fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Steverino 46

customer_reviews.title: Broken interface after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the product really is as good as everyone says, but we have a fantastic wifi connection, it was placed in a safe area, and literally 6 months after installation the interface stopped responding to touch (on the machine). After a rainstorm we noticed it disconnected from wifi (which has happened before) but then after this rainstorm in an effort to get it connected to internet again we went up to the machine and it wouldn't respond to touch at all. Quite faulty for quite a bit of money. (Also I should note, we live in Southern CA so "rainstorm" is an overstatement).
customer_reviews.author: Nadezdha

customer_reviews.title: Works great, with some bugs
customer_reviews.text: Have had this nearly a year, and it definitely works well regulating water usage in accordance with rain and wind. However, be wary if it loses it's WiFi connection, it tends to stay down, and full cycles may run. And we just had 5.75" of rain. When reconnected to WiFi, the app dashboard reflects zero water usage even though I was standing in my front yard wondering why the sprinkler was going off... What a waste of water! We have good WiFi house coverage, even in the garage. The TP-Link USB WiFi 'dongle' on this device is only 2G and not 5G, so you'll need 2G WiFi channels available on at least one of your access point(s).
customer_reviews.author: P. Hendrie

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a joke! It claims to factor weather into it’s watering algorithm. BS! It routinely doesn’t water when it’s 100 degrees (I’m in TX), and tonight I’m sitting on my porch watching a torrential thunderstorm downpour (we probably will get 2” of rain tonight), and my sprinklers are running!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it works, Poor Lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I've had this 12 HD model for about 3.5 years now. At first, it worked great! But year after year, the device degrades. Random screen freezes, wifi disconnects, and remote access failing. These get worse and worse as time went by. Factory resetting doesn't help and eventually the device just failed completely. For how expensive this is, I would have liked it to last longer. Now I need to shop for a new smart irrigation controller. Will look else where.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: High tech, apparently smarter than I am
customer_reviews.text: If you goal is save water and kill your lawn, this product is a home run. Saving money is great, but I have an irrigation system because I want a beautiful, green lawn. No matter how you set up this controller, it never competes the water cycle. It cuts off every zone, even if you disable the weather control. It could be a cool system, but after a full summer of use my lawn is quite thoroughly destroyed. Minneapolis
customer_reviews.author: Kepowisz

customer_reviews.title: Poor reliability
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! This died on me after less than one year. I'm currently on hold with customer service to see if they will honor their two-year warranty. No answer - They told me to leave a message.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and setup. Poor weather management.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: after a couple months, I've had to baby sit this thing more than my old system. It doesn't run after a week of no rain, yet it frequently runs schedules even after it rained the day before. For example, it rained 3.92 inches yesterday (unit shows 1.13) and its supposed to get about 1/2 inches or more today and tomorrow, yet it ran today's schedule at 60%. Disappointed to say the least. I bought this to replaced an old rain bird controller from the 90's. Very easy install and setup. Was able to setup 4 different weather sources and one was from a personal weather station a few blocks from my house through Weather Underground.
customer_reviews.author: rlong

customer_reviews.title: Easy install with all auto-pilot features, and not so easy for manual programming.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that I am in love with the device. If you want to be in the driver's seat, then set-up is a bit complicated. If you'll just go with the wizard installation and click next-next-next, then it's super easy, but it will "suggest" using way more water than I was comfortable with. Weather override settings are overriding things in several places in the UI, so if you want to disable them you'll have hunt down all "hidden" checkboxes and settings. That part of UI could use a redesign. Other than that it works pretty well. It is also surprisingly compact.
customer_reviews.author: DMK

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a failed competitive product... SKYDROP which was terrible This product beats the Skydrop by a long shot. After a year of use, this one is reliable and have a super nice user interface. It is great at not watering when it is rain or rain expected. The only feature I wish all of these controllers could do is to not water at a time of high wind. it is easy to get that info from the local weather service in the say way they predict rain.
customer_reviews.author: F4Flyer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Found This Rainmachine Controller
customer_reviews.text: It took me quite some time to get this all set up like I needed but I'm really pleased with the ease of making program changes now. It so easy using the mobile app to change watering times or turn stations on and off for special occasions. I was so upset by old push button controls that refused to work and was lucky to find this sophisticated computerized product. Also the wifi works even 40 ft away from the router.
customer_reviews.author: Gold Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Neat device that saves you money
customer_reviews.text: Overall experience has been great for our little RainMachine. I have 4 zones that I plan on expanded to more zones in the future, and have been very pleased with how well the device has worked for us! It has been a great addition to our smarthome, especially considering our past controller was loosing it's mind :P Also, for those who are shopping around, be sure to check if your area provides any incentives for water conservation. We received a check from the local water conservation group here for half the price of the device for upgrading our controller to a smart controller. You'll thank me later :D
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Rainmachine Impresses
customer_reviews.text: Switched from old hardware (perhaps 20 years old/previous home owner) to the Rainmachine.. wow what a difference. Liked: Easy to install (took no more than 1/2 hour). Easy set up ... while overall I understood the features, I called customer service for some additional insights. Rainmachine customer service was excellent - I didn't have me wait more than 1 minute to be connected and answered all my questions. BTW App is great as well. Dislike - NONE with regards to hardware, app and features... however, would be good if Quick-Start Guide had a few more pages to denote features - App vs Desktop etc. All in all, I would HIGHLY recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Duncan

customer_reviews.title: The one to get
customer_reviews.text: The features and the connectivity of flexibility are great! It can predict the capacity of the amount of water in the flower beds and lawn. Then adjust the watering schedule to save water. If you want to access it while you're away you can. If you want to keep it off the internet and use locally that works too. My favorite part is it's local (no cloud) and open source. I can use the API to make a seamless integration with the rest of my Home Assistant setup.
customer_reviews.author: C. Larry

customer_reviews.title: Take control of your watering
customer_reviews.text: I love my RainMachine! Since installing it, I've been able to better customize my lawn watering and I love how it adjusts watering time based on weather forecast (temperature and rain amount). My lawn has never been more healthy. Plus, using the phone app, I'm able to walk around my yard and test sprinklers quickly instead of the old way of turning on a section in the garage, then running out in the yard, watching, then running back to the garage to turn them off.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive product and easy install
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to hook-up it took me about 45 mins and the instructions are very intuitive. It has been running for four days now of which we have had rain on three of them - the controller has cut my consumption over the old controller by 85%. The phone app works great but it is nice that it can be controlled from the unit itself. I have synced it with Weather Underground as well as NOAH for greater accuracy - that was a little more complicated because you had to follow some steps on the WU developper site, but not really that difficult. Very happy with my purchase and it should pay for itself over the summer!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Oustanding application of technology for effective water management.
customer_reviews.text: The HD-12 has been in operation for two weeks. The programming was actually more simple than I had expected, and the flexibility of crafting your water schedule is terrific. There is access to programming areas that will allow (not required) to further adjust your programming... I added two additional weather stations operating in my locale (because I could) and adjusted a few zones to uniquely identify soil differences on my property. The APP works great, I don't need to get near the actual control box.
customer_reviews.author: Steven R.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great until it just stops. Dead Flowers and Grass.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March of 2019, had it professionally installed in April of 2019 and it performed brilliantly. 18 months later in September of 2020 it just stopped working. No warnings. No errors. No anything. We were away from home on a family emergency. It was sending notices that the sprinklers were running on schedule. We came home to dead flowerbeds and brown grass. Turns out that the unit was not sending the signal to the main valve and so although the well, pump, relays and valves were all running correctly, the unit never opened to main valve. For the price of this unit, it should last longer than 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: CleverNameHere

customer_reviews.title: Reliable with super easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I installed this about 2 months ago and its been performing flawlessly since then with pretty accurate adjustments to the watering schedule. Setup and programming is easy. I haven't used the mobile app interface because there isn't really a big need for it once the system is up an running. How many times do you need to remotely turn your sprinklers on and off? If you have multiple zones programming on the app would probably be easier though.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Broken / dead in one year.  POS.
customer_reviews.text: One star Because i can’t give it zero. It’s dead. Does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer Gill

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install/Great WiFi signal strength
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this controller so far. I have not programmed it yet, however, it was very easy to install and maintains a strong signal to my WiFi. (Another brand controller I tried had a very weak signal, and sometimes could not connect) I installed the wiring and named all the zones and downloaded pictures which was very easy. I also like that the controller is small and compact, and has a touch screen making it much easier to program and use than others with buttons and knobs. I will update this review once I start watering the lawn. So far, I really like this controller!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Year one - worked great. Booted up for this year and nothing but trouble. Weather won’t update “URL error”. Then WiFi connection issues...now can’t connect from my iPad. Giving up. Not worth the money. Support is non existent. Going to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, simple, beautifully designed product
customer_reviews.text: I installed the Rainmachine controler in less than 15 minutes - replaced my old sprinkler 12 zone system and it works beautifully. The Website is well designed, clear and with lots on information. The remote IOS interface is really nice and clean and the Web interface is also clear and nicely designed with a modern interface. I didnt know there were so many information you can take out of an irrigation system. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to upgrade their control panel.
customer_reviews.author: Porsche Carrera GT (CT)

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for chasing deer
customer_reviews.text: Installations and iPhone app work great, and quite easy. Replaced existing analog sprinkler timer. Perfect for watering, weather adjustments, and ideal for chasing deer out of the garden (by selecting the zones). Alexa integration is ok, voice commands work but a bit clunky...haven’t spent much time with Alexa, but not intuitive and required multiple voice commands.
customer_reviews.author: Renaroo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Broke down after 1 season Customer service was not able to fix the issue
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: Good product but needs a tweak in the programming for me.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this controller however in the high plains rain storms are usually small and spotty. So if it skips irrigation due to rain forecast and no rain is received your yard wont get water till the next programmed cycle. I have it looking at my PWS and wish if no rain was received it would water the following day. When it skips that cycle and my yard is looking really dry it gets pretty bad by the next cycle the sun really burns my yard. I will usually have to run a manual cycle so it gets water before the next cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Dow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and use
customer_reviews.text: Easy for me to review when I did NOT install this (my husband did) but literally pulled the old one out and installed this in less than an hour which was pretty impressive to me. Really small/compact unit which looks much better on the garage wall (at least half the size of our old, clunky unit), really sleek look and functions well. So far, we are really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installation and setup was easy!  App great, as well
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, zoning, setting times, etc. screen is sharp. Uses Nat weather station, and contrary to reviews, DOES indeed use Apple Homekit (older firmware did not). Can give zones custom names. Can even assign photos of zones to your App. Installation and setup was easy! App very easy to use and make adjustments to slope, shade, sq footage, and plant/grass types
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent controller, easy to use and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This controller is awesome, but mainly use the app for everything. The controller is very easy to set up and understand. The interface is simple, yet is beautiful in its simplicity. The apps interface is a little more difficult and has a lot more advanced features, but thats part of what makes this controller so great! Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Everything you can possibly need in a Irrigation system
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a system that was easy to use and gave me full control over my watering. This system does that and gives me even more options I will not even use. I control each zone sepratly giving options to water 1 zone 3 times or more a dat while having 5 other zones do other times all differently. Plus the web interface is simple to used as well as the phone app. I am very happy with this unit and would highly recommend to anyone who wants full control over every zone they have. I don't have Alexa so I could not rate that but Im sure it would be 5 starts!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Miller

customer_reviews.title: So far so GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Only had this programmer HD12 for a short time, but had worked flawlessly on how I set up the features I wanted and left off features I did not want to use right now. Easy easy install and WiFi set up. So far the best controller I have owned hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Abe

customer_reviews.title: This is actually an amazing product. I was floored by what it can ...
customer_reviews.text: This is actually an amazing product. I was floored by what it can do. I access it remotely from over 1700 miles away (its running the water system at my vacation home). It connects to NOAA and Weather Underground. It monitors the local temps, and waters the zones effectively. I've been running it for 5 months and it's saved me 1000's of gallons of water already. I have citrus trees on a separate zone and it knows how to water them. I get the info in the app on my iphone. It is truly IoT at its best. Very nice product!
customer_reviews.author: Clifton R Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, easy to install, and works!
customer_reviews.text: This system was installed in less than 20 minutes by me. Not a professional. It is simple and intuitive, with a very good UI for setting up. However it is really easy to set up from your smartphone. My only concern is that it would not connect to my TP link WiFi Router., which is odd because the antenna is a TP Link on the Rain Machine. It would be 5 Stars, but I had to connect to a different internet router to get this device online. Time will tell if it saves me water, but for not it is still way better than the 20 year old controller I did Have.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Starts having issues after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product-- for the first two years. After that, the unit randomly started skipping scheduled watering times. I worked with support extensively and they ruled out a software issue but found the unit was randomly freezing up and skipping watering periods. With only a one year warranty-- they said my only option was to ship the unit to them for repair at my expense. I'm buying a Rachio instead.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Work great and easy setup
customer_reviews.text: Product radically reduced my water usage, bills are way lower since it is great at water management. Installation was simple, took about 10 minutes with no special tools needed. It replaced a old school dial irrigation panel that was super simple. Setting up the regions and connectivity was a breeze. Plus it is fun as can be to sit on your phone and remotely turn on the sprinklers when you see your kids outside playing!! One minor issue I found was that after a power outage, restoring connectivity to WiFi seemed troublesome. Easily averted with simply lookin on your phone after a outage to ensure you are still connected.
customer_reviews.author: Mimir

customer_reviews.title: Reliability!
customer_reviews.text: Using this controller to water the lawn in our second house which is 800+mi away. So reliability is super important. I’ve had this controller for the past 3y without a single issue! It works seamlessly with the weather service and doesn’t over water the lawn. Additionally, the user interface is minimal and easy for anyone to understand and the setup is trivial. I love this product and am so glad I chose it.
customer_reviews.author: Oldman

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions carefully so you can customize the system.
customer_reviews.text: The rain machine is perfect for our use and a huge improvement over its predecessor system. I highly recommend it and particularly recommend it because of its ability to adjust to changing weather conditions. That is a real benefit for people who are not present all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Adamson

customer_reviews.title: Great sprinkler controller!
customer_reviews.text: Great sprinkler controller! Had a Lono before this and several others that I have forgotten about. This one has a great UI and very usable mobile software. Super simple to wire up, label zones, set programs, adjust days, etc. Finally, someone has figured out how to make a decent sprinkler controller.
customer_reviews.author: Brendon Cheves

customer_reviews.title: It worked for just over a year and then failed
customer_reviews.text: Fortunately there is a two year warranty, but they - from conversations with their tech department - send you a refurbished item. Generally it worked ok and being able to activate the various sprinklers remotely with my iPhone was a real plus. WiFi could be hit or miss also, but that may have been a function of my house system because it did improve when I installed a mesh network.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Your Standard Controller
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a new house, and the existing sprinkler controller was terrible. I've never had a good experience with any sprinkler controller, so I decided to spend the money to get something good. The RainMachine has not disappointed. It was incredibly easy to set up, including getting all of my zones named and programs created. The forecasting does a very good job of adjusting the amount of water applied when a program is run, and the data provided on past waterings is very useful. To top it off, my local water company even offered a $50 rebate to put this in. Be sure to check with yours!
customer_reviews.author: Helius

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works like a champ. When it rained lightly yesterday, on a scheduled day that the lawn would normally be sprinkled, the Rain Machine reduced the total watering time significantly. The lawn didn't get over-watered and we saved water and money. It's user interface is great, easy to use. Shows up as an Android device on my WiFi network map. Being able to control everything from the local interface or via phone or tablet is just fantastic. I had our sprinkler guy install this just so I had a good comfort level but could easily have done it myself. He (the sprinkler guy) said he would be recommending this controller to others, he was impressed also!
customer_reviews.author: Mark - K8VL

customer_reviews.title: Slick product, very easy to install (30 mins or less)
customer_reviews.text: Slick product, very easy to install. Have 12 zones, total time to remove old unit and install new until under 30 mins. Programming takes an additional 15 mins. The only comment for improvement, they should add a small wire junction box below the current base unit. Connecting the wires is very easy, they provide the small screw driver, but as noted without the junction box the wires stick out 1" below the unit. No big deal! Now the test will be the time in service.
customer_reviews.author: Make America Great Again

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product and Customer service!!  I am recommending to everyone that I know.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I got was defective. I called customer support and let then know that the buttons on the left side were not working. The phone call lasted less then 5 minutes and they sent me a replacement device with 2 day shipping. The customer service was fantastic!! Fred and Lukas were amazing and apologetic for the inconvenience. The replacement device I had set up a few minutes. It works perfectly. I would recommend setting it up on the couch and going through the process to get the remote management setup. After it is setup, then put it on the wall and connect all of your zones.
customer_reviews.author: BilliamIV

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I used to dread going out to the box and trying to program my manual rainbird controller. This thing is great. Very easy to program using the touchpad or mobile app. I bought the 12 zone version. I did install a surge protected outlet in the outdoor box with the unit after having some problems with a defective GFCI in the outdoor box. The main thing that led me to buy this unit is that its not reliant on any web site, web server or service bureau. It will run standalone. I've seen too many companies come and go.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great irrigation controller
customer_reviews.text: Great irrigation controller. I had no problems in connecting it to my four zone sprinkler valves and get it on my WiFi network. There was no problem in setting up port forwarding on my router so I can remote to it from my smartphone. I wished it has the ability to give it a specific IP address but it only uses DHCP. I wished it is EPA Watersense certified so I could get a rebate but I heard the company is working on the certification. And I wished the display can be set to stay on continuously instead of the maximum timeout of 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: and I love it. the app isn't the most intuitive and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a couple months now, and I love it. the app isn't the most intuitive and has an odd bug or two, but its easy to setup and use, the panel took two minutes for me to install, and i love that if the companys servers ever went down, or our internet went out, we still have a touchscreen to use to set it manually, unlike some other brands no-screen control pad
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great device.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is completely awesome. Picked it up for 200.00 on Amazon warehouse deals. I had to call customer service once to do a small amount of troubleshooting. The person that owned it before me had their information in it that I had to clear out. This will pay for itself in no time. This will also be handy when winterizing the system. I will no longer have to run back and forth to the controller or have to have someone on the phone at the controller while checking each zone!! Great product!! Android app is good, wish there was a Windows 10/mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Installed June 5th.....BROKEN August 31.
customer_reviews.text: Got back from a trip and noticed the yard looking a little dry......tried to login to RainMachine....showed "Offline." Interesting. Just looked at the box....no display or anything. Bad plug? Nope. Bad Rain Machine....yep. $250 down the drain. Won't replace with this model.
customer_reviews.author: John Fawcett

customer_reviews.title: ... mine for over 2 years now and it's been great. Waters less in the winter on it's own
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine for over 2 years now and it's been great. Waters less in the winter on it's own, and waters more in the summer if the day will be extra hot. Automatically rain delays, and you can even tell it which zone is what, like zone 1 is a lawn, but zone 2 is a tree, and zone 3 are flowers/plants so it can vary the watering appropriately. Free yourselves from hard to setup watering systems. Get a rain machine, from a company based in silicon valley, that stands behind his products and has great support. My few interactions with them have been prompt and informative.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bains

customer_reviews.title: Another 'dumb' home functions now enlightened.
customer_reviews.text: Just installed it yesterday. I'd recommend watching some of the YouTube videos but this is VERY easy to install. My NEST thermostat might have been harder. Still playing to settings and I'm sure I'll be tuning for a bit. Online profile fairly easy to set up. Password changes on the online profile take a few minutes to propagate when you change it on IOS then try to log in on a browser. One glitch - temp on browser screen always in Celsius even though my pref say US/Fahrenheit. It's fine on the unit and on IOS. I may come back and add later.
customer_reviews.author: H. Martin Capurro

customer_reviews.title: convoluted setup
customer_reviews.text: After trying for weeks, hiring two different irrigation contractors I've given up. this system stinks!!!!!!!!!!! DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT IT'S A GIANT RIPOFF
customer_reviews.author: G. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: RainMachine Touch HD-12 is outstanding
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and going now. Just all around a stellar product.!
customer_reviews.author: B. Baker

customer_reviews.title: This is an easy DIY that will save you money!
customer_reviews.text: This was an easy DIY that is saving me money and my Well pump. Tip: Take a photo of the wiring on your old controller before you start or label the wires by zone. It took me about 30 minutes to get the old one removed and the Rainmachine hooked up. Plan another 30 minutes for the setup. The interface is excellent and I really like the touch screen and IOS app.
customer_reviews.author: SteveMI

customer_reviews.title: The main reason I bought this unit is how easy it is to program
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I bought this unit is how easy it is to program. Programming the sprinkler unit is done so seldom that every time I had to use the manual and use a bunch of convoluted steps. This unit is intuitive. You can either program it at the unit or via you cell phone app. It's self learning and adapts depending on the weather. It's more expensive than a traditional unit, but it safes a lot of water. It does e Require a wifi internet connection.
customer_reviews.author: TR

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It was easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It was easy to install and setup. Eliminates any local rain sensor which is one of the big reasons why I ordered this... got annoyed with my sprinklers running when it was pouring out. It does require you to create programs of when you would normally schedule watering but then it takes over and adjusts the actual watering based on the weather. I've only had it for a week now but it has been raining here off and on all week so I have seen a good example of how it works and it's showing I saved 34% water in the last 7 days.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B.

customer_reviews.title: This is not your ordinary sprinkler timer it is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is not your ordinary sprinkler timer it is a crowd Source data collector that is the most incredible piece of equipment that you could buy. It will determine the amount to water based on rainfall ,heat ,moisture ,evaporation rate, slope soil type and real-time weather data. It is an absolutely an incredible piece of equipment don't even think about it just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: The Tester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to replace but lack clean look around it as no place to hide the wires hanging below.
customer_reviews.text: It is very small and sleek unit. Wifi works great. It was easy to replace the old sprinkler controller as the wires were already there. However this unti has no box. So all the wires will hang below the unti and don't give you a good look. There is no off or on button, but you can pause it for few days if you don't want to water your lawn. It tell you when the next water run is scheduled but does not tell you when was the last water run.
customer_reviews.author: Hina

customer_reviews.title: This should be mandatory if you have sprinklers!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product! It’s smart technology has saved me over 15,000 gallons of sprinkler water in just 6 weeks! The ability of the machine to look at the weather coming saves you over-watering when it is going to rain for the next few days! So incredibly easy to set up, program, and control by the app! I couldn’t rate it high enough!
customer_reviews.author: The Shark

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to program.
customer_reviews.text: The RainMachine is the bomb (good). I replaced my old Rain Bird conventional timer-controller. The RM is way, way, way easier to program. I control mine through Alexa (I have 4 Alexas outside under the eaves) - the RM is just great. I had never heard of RM when I started searching, but I took the chance aynd was rewarded.
customer_reviews.author: mattchematt

customer_reviews.title: The RainMachine is flat out useful and fun
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated getting this controller because it seemed too easy. My only regret is not getting it sooner. I watched a handful of YouTube videos before buying and those were helpful for understanding programming and installation. Additionally, for me, the home-sprinkler controller is sitting only about 20' away from the home wifi antenna so the signal is a boomer. Setup is a snap, it holds programming without power which means annoying power losses don't result in having to reprogram. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement for my legacy system
customer_reviews.text: I am so far happy with my Rain Machine. I wanted to have a system with a display in my garage that I can walk up to and adjust as well be able to do it remotely from my phone. I now have that with my new system. It was super easy to install and pretty easy to use. The phone app could use a little modernization, but I am fine with what is available today.
customer_reviews.author: Sod

customer_reviews.title: Great Overall Function.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Does an excellent job of managing my sprinkler system. The app is intuitive and easy to use. Happy to say you can disable the Alexa feature, as I for one do not want anything in my home that allows Amazon to listen in on my life.
customer_reviews.author: D J RAUGLAS

customer_reviews.title: Great product; cloud service slow.
customer_reviews.text: Works well as a smart controller and has great features. The only issue I have is the cloud service seems slow. Sometimes the app take 5+ minutes to load. Frustrating. Other than that, everything works well and the other smart features are great!
customer_reviews.author: NeverB4

customer_reviews.title: No manual
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy who loves to read and re-read manual before installing/using any product. I was obviously surprised when I did not see any manual in the package, but there was a quick install instructions which also doubled up as drilling guide. Installation and usage is relatively straight-forward. It's basically an Android device :) Another thing, I did not realize that the graph on main screen in % of water used till 1 day later, I initially thought it's predicted chance of precipitation. Interface could be more responsive though ( there goes 1 star), you can feel it's very slow to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Gaurav

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smart irrigation controller
customer_reviews.text: Sprinkler controller works great! Decided to go with raonmachine over competitors since it does not rely on the companies own servers. Of their server goes down or my internet is down, the sprinklers still function and the controller will run the schedules using the data it had before the outage. Also nice to be able to change settings on the controller itself of I don't want to pull out my phone
customer_reviews.author: John R

customer_reviews.title: Water saver...Stop over or under-watering your lawn.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this controller since it first came on the market 2 seasons ago. It has worked great since I got it and only gets better with software updates by the manufacturer. I even replaced my fathers old Toro controller with this one and he loves it. Control your system from your couch...water on demand from your phone, turn your system or zones on or off from overseas...but best of all you really never have to touch it since it calculates rainfall amounts in your area and using an algorithm and NOAA data, limits or even increases your watering times depending on the weather.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in April but used it for the first time today (I live in Chicago). it worked perfectly! I love the ease of the phone app and can't wait to set it up on Alexa! It was easy to install (I did it myself) and to setup. No complicated computer programming or system setups. My only regret is not buying this sooner...my old system was more than 20 years old and worked well until the dogs ripped it off the wall. Thank you dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Meg Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for in a sprinkler controller.  Satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Installed the RainMachine in September replacing a RainBird controller and have been pleased with the performance. It has kept up with always changing Michigan weather conditions and I havent had to overrule any of it's programming decisions. The screen is about the same size and resolution as a iPhone 3G (just my opinion) so don't expect a high-res tablet hanging off your wall out of this. I was able to configure a port to sync my Galaxy. My only suggestion to Green Electronics is to add a motion sensor that allows the unit to light up and "greet" the user as one walks up (adds to the coolness factor like the Nest).
customer_reviews.author: jk2john

customer_reviews.title: This product is so good, I had to take the time to review it.
customer_reviews.text: So this will be my first Amazon review after being an avid shopper & store card holder for years. The screen is easy to use, intuitive and robust. The app, contrary to what others said is very friendly and smooth. The turn on/off cycle for each zone takes less than 15 seconds. You really would be hard pressed to find a better smart sprinkler. The one tip I would have is buy the Orbit sprinkler box if you plan to install in a garage or outdoors. So worth the extra money for such a clean install.
customer_reviews.author: Casey L Colvin

customer_reviews.title: sprinker controller works well, app on phone sucks pretty bad
customer_reviews.text: The sprinkler controller was pretty easy to install and came with good instructions. Using the controller itself is very easy, visually appeasing and pretty straightforward. It runs on a modified version of Android (looks like gingerbread to me, android 2.3) so it can be laggy at times but it does the job. My main gripe here is the mobile app sucks pretty bad, it takes forever to get into the controller itself, the app is pretty finicky, and the app itself is just a webapp converted into an app. Would be 5 stars if they could update the app to something better.
customer_reviews.author: a2thejay23

customer_reviews.title: Awesome High Tech Controller
customer_reviews.text: This controller is awesome. It is very easy to install and program. It keeps you out of the corner of the garage trying to operate sprinkler. The ability to control with mobile device for routine maintenance is alone worth the price. My wife says she finally is able to operate sprinkler system, which again is worth the price. The only difficult thing is programming your router(s) to allow access across town or the continent. RainMachine's support is awesome in helping you with this programming. You send in an email requesting support. Suggest you ask them right off the bat to access your computer and fix.
customer_reviews.author: J. Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great product - great programming - love the iPad interface
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Seems I have a house in the way between my sprinkler timer and a lot of my stations. To be able to control from my iPad is awesome. Also to look out your window, decide the lawn is looking a little dry in that section and just add a minute or two to that program on the ipad is great. I also have trees that need water every 3 days, lawn every other day, veggie garden every day. Accommodates this easily and could have even more programs. I did mount it into the Orbit 57095 (but bought at local orange big box store). Fits easily with room to burn, although the transformer was at maximum height.
customer_reviews.author: Firebird

customer_reviews.title: Handy to water the lawn from your computer and save water in the process.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to install. No need for a phone to run this system, but that is one option. The user can run stations with ease directly from the unit or a computer as well. Logical programming and great for setting up different cycles as needed. Away from home and hear about a heat-wave? Run it from anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Oso

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic. Mostly works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Mostly works as expected... Sometimes I disagree with it's "water surplus" assessment, but you can override if you like... I've hooked up to run with Alexa... Requires an IFTTT applet and separate command "triggers" for each zone you wish to initiate, but that's for fun mostly, you can just hook it up and forget it if you like. So far, I'm happy.. Like all devices, there's a learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Mushy

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase based on initial experience
customer_reviews.text: Just received that today. It was very easy to install. Interface is excellent - very easy to set up and program. Portforward worked well on my router. The app in Iphone and access through browser is not as slick as functionality that can be programmed on the device itself. All of the device functionality is not available over internet (phone or PC). There is room for improvement in these areas. Build quality looks good. I will also like to see a password on device itself. Currently there is no password when you work directly on device - password is for network access only. Overall, I am glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Quick install and easy programming. So far so good (3 months use)
customer_reviews.text: Quick install and easy programming. So far so good (3 months use). Easy to access from anywhere. No complaints - much more flexible and convenient than my 20 year old Hunter controller. Would be nice to be able to track total water usage based on user input sprinkler consumption. Love the reporting of gallons of water saved. Update - 6 months in and it continues to operate flawlessly. Lawn is in great shape and reported water saved since March is +70,000 gallons. At a 1/2 cent a gallon for water it's already paid for itself and more.
customer_reviews.author: jrgs2012

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I expect to see savings at the end of the watering season
customer_reviews.text: Easy replacement of my existing Rain Bird controller. Love the functionality of it and the app allows you to take an actual photo of each zone so you can spot water if needed. I've had it installed for more than 1 month now and no loss of connectivity or negative performance. I really think this was a wise investment in conservation and will try to post actual consumption savings data at the end of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: AOPAaviator

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device. Wifi not so good. Still strongly recommend if it holds up as many years as my Cyber rain.
customer_reviews.text: I love the touch screen. Easy to use and program. Wifi reliability is awful. It's on line, it's off line. Not a huge deal just detracts from what would otherwise be a stellar product. I love that it's cloud independent. That was a must have. We will see how durable it is. Bought with Orbit box. That is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great interface at the box and on your mobile device
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic irrigation controller! We wanted to update to a device that could be controlled from a iPhone. Most of the products available that provide that capability are plain boxes that can ONLY be controlled from a mobile device. This RainMachine adds an extremely nice touch-screen interface at the box itself so that there we're not fully reliant on a network connection. Gone are the days of struggling through archaic programming sequences with dials and buttons. Managing our irrigation system is now so easy and convenient. We absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Coast to Coast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent smart irrigation controller. Saved over 50% of water since I installed it 3 years ago. Very easy to setup and use. In fact, I think I am addicted to it. I check it almost every other day. I never touched the old controller with dials. I have 3 of them due to the amount of valves I need to control. Wish list: I wish I could program them as one controller (virtually combining the 3 controller into one in the app), so I didn't have to adjust the start time every time I made a change on one.
customer_reviews.author: Big Guy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product Thus Far
customer_reviews.text: This unit looks very good on your wall! i enjoy the functionality of being able to manage water usage on ths go. I can't comment on water savings as i just brought the house last month. I did download the rainmachine skill to my Echo Dot but have yet to utilize this feature. Def worth money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Chuckj412

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Install only took about 20 minutes and it works great so far. I've had this installed a couple weeks and I really like it. I tried another smart sprinkler system (rachio) but it was a pain to setup or broken. After talking to their support multiple times they couldn't get it working and didn't offer an exchange so I returned it to amazon and got this one. Having a touchscreen is so much nicer too!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and good value
customer_reviews.text: Really love this as it's a huge upgrade on our old manual sprinkler command center. Awesome that it incorporates rain Information.. hoping it saves us some money on the water bill this spring since we've had so much rain.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Super easy install
customer_reviews.text: Super clear installation replacing an old legacy system, took maybe 10 minutes. Easy user interface. I called support with a quick question at maybe 7p and got an engineer on the phone that was super helpful. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Z

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT, EXCEPT FOR THE IPHONE/IPAD APP
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Sometimes the IOS (Iphone) app "loses" the RainMachine and claims "No RainMachines Found." After some frustration and experimentation, we discovered that unplugging the RainMachine for 1 minute or 2 and then plugging it back in seems to solve this issue (at least for us). Tech Support for Green Electronics has been very helpful, and they promise a new version of the software (for the RM) should be available soon that will ameliorate the "NO RAINMACHINES FOUND" iPhone issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really a time and Water Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have had two of these going for 9 months and it is wonderful to not worry about turning zones on and off and adjusting times through the year. They have saved a ton of water as well by automatically adjusting the watering time based on the actual weather. I have two areas for improvement. First, they don't have a cloud service, so you can't access your Rainmachine outside of your home network (you can if you are a geek). Nor can you see watering reports showing your history. Both would be really nice.
customer_reviews.author: PAD

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Great to turn on a zone from ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one and this is for another house. Love it. Great to turn on a zone from anywhere via phone. it knows when to water based on network weather data. Keeps record of watering usage. Would be great on rental homes so you can water the lawn even if the renter tries to turn it off. LOL. Or prove they did not water and that is why the lawn, garden is shot. Makes life better. Get one, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D Powell

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Simple installation and I tried another brand and returned it before getting this. If you want simplicity on the install, use, and just everything about it. Buy this product and save yourself a lot of time. The RainMachine to others is like a Tesla compared to a Model T Ford. I don't write product reviews unless they are exceptional or complete junk and this is an exceptional product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Wiles

customer_reviews.title: Yes, Yes & Yes... Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: A great device!! Well worth the $$$ and easy to (1) set up and (2) use. There’s a reason that you may find this product completely sells-out periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Marin Johnny

customer_reviews.title: I wish I've bought it sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The first time I've ordered, I've received a defected item and had to return. No matter. I've re-ordered since I had my faith with product, and I was right! I can't believe I've lived without this for so long. It is very easy to program the watering schedule, and I can do it from my iPhone! The best part of ability to operate from my phone is when I'm making adjustments to the irrigation system out there in the yard. There's no need to run back and forth, or having to ask someone to help me any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Seamlessly connects to existing sprinkler system. Replaced a rain bird with no issues, with some modification I was even able to use the rain bird housing to protect the touch screen. Being able to adjust settings from anywhere in the world is great, I mean literally sitting on the other side of the world turning on a single zone to hit a dry spot the wife brought to my attention is a game changer. A lot of features and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Gixxer750

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product if you prize convenience and savings
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you prize convenience and savings. With the RainMachine HD-12 I can now water mylawn from anywhere in the world and change all settings from my fingertips. There are also more advanced features so that you can set your terrain and types of lawns, etc. If I know the ease of changing the unit and setting up, I would have changed my analog unit years ago. Green Electronics was readily available to support me as the first unit delivered had issues, but quickly worked to resolve the issue and sent out a new unit. I would recommend this product for anyone with multiple watering zones and require lots of watering for their landscape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: How have I lived my life without this! All I can say literally is this is amazing! It works as described and has saved me over $50 a month.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, intuitive to use
customer_reviews.text: Awesome controller. Super easy to install and setup, and the control that the app gives you is amazing. You can take pictures of your zones and control the details of them in numerous useful ways. My original controller crapped out...glad it did because I otherwise would not have bought this and found out how amazing it is.
customer_reviews.author: svw

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with SmartThings
customer_reviews.text: Specifically bought it for it's supposed integration with SmartThings - their integration is broken and doesn't work. I regret my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel A.

customer_reviews.title: Never look back to conventional timer again!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have! You will save water and more importantly, dial in the amount of water your lawn and vegetation needs. It adjusts to the local forecast. It even activates only the zones that need water, bypassing others according to how you configured the zones i.e. head type, soil type, vegetation, shade, etc. You can really fine tune if needed. Never look back to conventional timer again!
customer_reviews.author: Sal M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for a while - but software is glitchy
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this system. It worked very well for 2 years. And then it turns off randomly and the app doesn’t notify me. I have to keep resetting and re-program. Future models should notify users through the app when the system is offline. My grass is dying because i don’t know when it’s not working.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Heter

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Good!
customer_reviews.text: Compared to all of the Irrigation controls I've researched, the Rainmachine makes most of the others look like a ten year old Corolla. They all do the job just fine, but they really aren't enjoyable to operate. It only took fifteen minutes to set up the Rainmachine and it is incredibly intuitive and easy to use. The touch sensitive screen is very responsive, high-resolution and bright. The iPhone app is glitch free as well. It's day one, and I'm very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: DG

product_meta.title: RainMachine Touch HD-12, Cloud Independent Smart Wi-Fi Irrigation Controller, Compatible with Alexa, 12 Zones
product_meta.description:
Size:12 Zones

RainMachine Touch HD, Cloud Independent, Touch, 12/16 Zones Wi-Fi Smart Irrigation Controller, Compatible with Alexa



The Wi-Fi Forecast Sprinkler. Conserve water.

The RainMachine sprinkler controller automatically adjusts your watering amount by lowering it on rainy or colder days and increasing it on hot summer days. The system not only saves water but it also protects your plants. The versatility of each program is unprecedented: select individual weekdays, Even/Odd day mode, Cycle and Soak, or Station Delay. Run the programs one-at-a-time, sequentially or even in parallel! The RainMachine Wi-Fi sprinkler timer is designed to handle possible conflicts, like simultaneous commands to the same valve or overlapping schedules.

NOAA. A weather-ready nation.

Your RainMachine sprinkler controller connects via WIFI and gets the best weather data available on earth. NOAA employs satellites, radars, weather stations, and highly qualified meteorologists, delivering the most accurate weather forecast on the planet. Complex mathematical models that run on huge data centers are free for you to use in your garden. Yes, free, already paid from your tax money. Using your exact street location, the RainMachine sprinkler timer downloads precise weather data, accommodating to specific micro-climates. Let it rain!

No data? No problem. Switch to statistics.

When no forecast data is available the RainMachine will automatically switch to historical weather statistics. This way the RainMachine conserves water even if the Internet goes down.

Garden from any screen. Easy connect. Easy control.

Garden from iPhone, garden from Android, garden from any screen. The application automatically discovers all RainMachines on your local network and makes them accessible through an easy to use and secure interface.

http://www.rainmachine.com
feature_bullets: SMART SCHEDULE & SAVE WATER - Save water with real-time weather adjustments. (EPA WaterSense Certified, check for rebates).
FREE WEATHER DATA - Direct access to NOAA, METNO or Wunderground, OpenWeatherMap, NetAtmo. Use National or Personal Weather Stations for pinpoint accuracy.
CONTROL FROM ANYWHERE - Color Touch Screen, iPhone, and Android, PC browser access with dashboard stats. Works from Home, Work or Vacation.
UPDATED MODEL (2019) - Improved WIFI. hundreds of Schedule and UI improvements. Integrate with Alexa, Google Home, Nest, WINK, SmartThings via IFTTT.
CLOUD INDEPENDENT - All personal data stored locally. RainMachine continues to work even when WiFi is down. Forecast spatial resolution: upto 1.5 km

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars882 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
